headline: The TJX Companies, Inc. Announces Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: FRAMINGHAM, Mass., June 10, 2025--The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TJX) today announced the declaration of a quarterly dividend on its common stock of $.425 per share payable September 4, 2025, to shareholders of record on August 14, 2025.

headline: American Century Growth Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: We seek to invest in larger U.S. companies demonstrating they have improving businesses as opposed to absolute levels of growth. Read more here.
